comments:
Empty strings in Extended Data Elements are not serialized.

For example,

public void testEmtpyEDEValue() throws Exception {
		String cbeString;
		{	
			CommonBaseEvent cbe = EventFactoryImpl.getInstance
().createCommonBaseEvent();
			CommonBaseEventLogRecord cbelr = new 
CommonBaseEventLogRecord(cbe);
			cbelr.setLoggerName("");
			
			assertEquals(cbelr.getLoggerName(), "");	
	<< this works fine
			cbeString = EventFormatter.toCanonicalXMLString(cbe);
		}

		System.out.println("cbestring:"+cbeString);
		CommonBaseEvent cbe2 = EventFormatter.eventFromCanonicalXML
(cbeString);
		CommonBaseEventLogRecord cbelr2 = new CommonBaseEventLogRecord
(cbe2);
		
		assertEquals(cbelr2.getLoggerName(), "");		<< this 
causes an Exception in getLoggerName
	}	


The output is:

cbestring:<CommonBaseEvent creationTime="2004-09-25T16:03:23.637Z" 
version="1.0.1">
	<extendedDataElements name="sequenceNumber" type="long">
		<values>14</values>
	</extendedDataElements>
	<extendedDataElements name="threadID" type="int">
		<values>10</values>
	</extendedDataElements>
	<extendedDataElements name="loggerName" type="string">		Note - 
no "values" in this EDE
	</extendedDataElements>
</CommonBaseEvent>
E.E.
Time: 1.723
